channel.title: Client Wont Let Others On
channel.description:
I have a server and I tried to play it on my other computer, but the client wont open up after I edit the server ip in the GUI.java. I have hosted a online server using this same client and source before and now the client wont open up. I can open it on my computer, but others can't open it on theirs. My friends can connect to the server by using the moparscape client, but the graphics are all messed up so I dont want to use that. Is there a fix to this? Here is a picture of what pops up in the CMD: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/221/whycnx.png/][IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/2993/whycnx.png[/img][/URL]
Thanks

item.title: Client Wont Let Others On
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The code was compiled with JDK7, and you’re trying to run it with Java 6

Read full topic

item.title: Client Wont Let Others On
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you need to download a higher version of java

Read full topic
